name: Color Blast
description:
Color Blast is a simple & fun top-down shooter where the objective is to survives as long as possible by blasting the colorful bubbles from hitting you.

 Controls
  • Mouse to aim + shoot
  • Space to change color
Credits
  • BGM
    : https://freesound.org/people/MSFX/sounds/423162/
  • Font
    : https://www.wfonts.com/font/varickasc
